text: Francis M. "Bud" Mullen, Jr. (born December 14, 1934) is an American politician. He was the executive assistant director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI). He was the 3rd Administrator of the Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) from 1981 to 1985. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:American police officers Category:Drug Enforcement Administration Administrators Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Francis M. Mullen
